title: Royal Stirling
creator_credit: Films of Scotland, Campbell Harper and Mark Littlewood
brief_description: The town of Stirling is at the centre of Scotland’s history, as those battles which determined her independence were fought within sight of Stirling Castle. Historical landmarks contrast with the newly founded University which has brought a sense of new life to the area.
